    TRAVIS COUNTY, Texas (KXAN) — A Travis County Sheriff’s Office detective is on administrative leave following allegations of sexual assault, the office said Wednesday.Stephen Nicholas Broderick, 40, is charged with sexual assault of a child — a first degree felony — in early June, according to an arrest affidavit.The Texas Rangers are investigating the case. As of Wednesday, Broderick is in custody at Travis County jail with a $100,000 bond.

A 2013 Chevrolet Sonic was going northbound on the highway, moved off the right side of the road and hit an embankment.
